subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a 23-43 season, the Warriors are 11-7 this season and face the Nets in Brooklyn on Friday night with two ex-Knicks in David Lee and Coach Mark Jackson.
snippet: Coming off a 23-43 season, the Warriors are 11-7 this season and face the Nets in Brooklyn on Friday night with two ex-Knicks in David Lee and Coach Mark Jackson.
